amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to decrease funding for the Housing Opportunities for Persons With AIDS program by $505 million dollars and transfer the savings to Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Housing Opportunities for Persons With AIDS by $505 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 282 (Roll no. 609).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 282 (Roll no. 609).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
